languages.text: "Я стала лучше понимать мелкие и гнусные стремления, что толкают к греху. Я научилась прозревать их во взгляде. Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, каково это — знать каждый оттенок скверны, что селится в грешных душах..."

"I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."
languages.original_text: "Я стала лучше понимать мелкие и гнусные стремления, что толкают к греху. Я научилась прозревать их во взгляде. Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, каково это — знать каждый оттенок скверны, что селится в грешных душах..."

languages.text: “我已经更加了解这些意志薄弱之人，理解了是怎样卑劣、可憎的冲动驱使他们进行犯罪。我也学会了如何从他们的眼神中看到这些冲动。如果你能了解，潜伏在在堕落灵魂中的每种腐化是什么滋味的话……”
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: “我已经更加了解这些意志薄弱之人，理解了是怎样卑劣、可憎的冲动驱使他们进行犯罪。我也学会了如何从他们的眼神中看到这些冲动。如果你能了解，潜伏在在堕落灵魂中的每种腐化是什么滋味的话……”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「私は、意思の弱い者を堕落へと引きずり込む卑小で醜悪な衝動に関しての理解を深めてきた。彼らの目の中に潜むその衝動を、見分けることが可能になったのだ。堕落した魂に潜む全ての腐敗を知る事。それがどんな事か、お前には見当もつかないだろう…」
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、意思の弱い者を堕落へと引きずり込む卑小で醜悪な衝動に関しての理解を深めてきた。彼らの目の中に潜むその衝動を、見分けることが可能になったのだ。堕落した魂に潜む全ての腐敗を知る事。それがどんな事か、お前には見当もつかないだろう…」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «He profundizado en mi comprensión de los impulsos ruines e insufribles que llevan a los de voluntad débil a la depravación. He aprendido a ver estos impulsos en sus ojos. Si supiera lo que es familiarizarse con cada matiz de corrupción que acecha en las almas depravadas...».
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: «He profundizado en mi comprensión de los impulsos ruines e insufribles que llevan a los de voluntad débil a la depravación. He aprendido a ver estos impulsos en sus ojos. Si supiera lo que es familiarizarse con cada matiz de corrupción que acecha en las almas depravadas...».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich habe mein Verständnis der schändlichen Begierden vertieft, welche jene mit schwachem Willen in die Verkommenheit treiben. Ich habe gelernt, diese Begierden in ihren Augen zu sehen. Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, wie es ist, jede Schattierung der Verderbnis zu kennen, die in verkommenen Seelen lauert ..."
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mein Verständnis der schändlichen Begierden vertieft, welche jene mit schwachem Willen in die Verkommenheit treiben. Ich habe gelernt, diese Begierden in ihren Augen zu sehen. Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, wie es ist, jede Schattierung der Verderbnis zu kennen, die in verkommenen Seelen lauert ..."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « J'ai approfondi ma compréhension des désirs primitifs et abjects qui mènent à la dégénérescence des esprits faibles. J'ai appris à les déceler dans leurs yeux. Si seulement vous saviez ce que l'on ressent lorsque l'on connaît chacune des nuances de la corruption qui habite les âmes dépravées... »
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai approfondi ma compréhension des désirs primitifs et abjects qui mènent à la dégénérescence des esprits faibles. J'ai appris à les déceler dans leurs yeux. Si seulement vous saviez ce que l'on ressent lorsque l'on connaît chacune des nuances de la corruption qui habite les âmes dépravées... »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Zayıf iradeli olanları bozulmaya iten bayağı ve iğrenç dürtülere dair anlayışımı derinleştirdim. Bu dürtüleri gözlerinde görebilmeyi öğrendim. Ahlaksız ruhlarda kol gezen yozlaşmanın her bir tonuna aşina olmak nasıl bir şey, keşke bilebilseydin."
languages.original_text: "I have deepened my understanding of the petty and odious urges that drive the weak-willed to degeneracy. I have learned to see these urges in their eyes. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Zayıf iradeli olanları bozulmaya iten bayağı ve iğrenç dürtüler hakkındaki anlayışımı derinleştirdim. Bu dürtüleri gözlerinde görebilmeyi öğrendim. Ahlaksız ruhlarda kol gezen yozlaşmanın her bir tonuna aşina olmak nasıl bir şey, keşke bilebilseydin."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
